get.description: Lists all of the available NotificationHubs REST API operations.

default.description: NotificationHubs error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Checks the availability of the given service namespace across all Azure subscriptions. This is useful because the domain name is created based on the service namespace name.

200.description: Checks if the Namespace name is a valid available name

put.description: Creates/Updates a service namespace. Once created, this namespace's resource manifest is immutable. This operation is idempotent.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to create a Namespace Resource.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to patch a Namespace Resource.

delete.description: Deletes an existing namespace. This operation also removes all associated notificationHubs under the namespace.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

202.description: Namespace delete request has been accepted

get.description: Returns the description for the specified namespace.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

get.description: Lists the available namespaces within a resourceGroup.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group. If resourceGroupName value is null the method lists all the namespaces within subscription

200.description: Lists all Namespaces with the ResourceGroup

get.description: Lists all the available namespaces within the subscription irrespective of the resourceGroups.

200.description: Gets all the Namespaces within the subscription irrespective of the ResourceGroup

get.description: Gets the authorization rules for a namespace.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

200.description: Get the List of AuthorizationRules of a Namespace

post.description: Gets the Primary and Secondary ConnectionStrings to the namespace

parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: authorizationRuleName
parameters.description: The connection string of the namespace for the specified authorizationRule.

200.description: Gets the Namespace AuthorizationRule's Primary keys and Secondary keys along with the ConnectionStrings

post.description: Regenerates the Primary/Secondary Keys to the Namespace Authorization Rule

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: authorizationRuleName
parameters.description: The connection string of the namespace for the specified authorizationRule.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to regenerate the Namespace Authorization Rule Key.

200.description: Regenerate the Primary/Secondary Key and returns the Keys and the connection string

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list NotificationHubs operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of NotificationHubs operations supported by the Microsoft.NotificationHubs resource provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Invoice, etc.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

ErrorResponse.description: Error response indicates NotificationHubs service is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

sku.description: The sku of the created namespace

isAvailiable.description: True if the name is available and can be used to create new Namespace/NotificationHub. Otherwise false.

CheckAvailabilityParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Check Name Availability for Namespace and NotificationHubs.

isAvailiable.description: True if the name is available and can be used to create new Namespace/NotificationHub. Otherwise false.

region.description: Specifies the targeted region in which the namespace should be created. It can be any of the following values: Australia East, Australia Southeast, Central US, East US, East US 2, West US, North Central US, South Central US, East Asia, Southeast Asia, Brazil South, Japan East, Japan West, North Europe, West Europe

status.description: Status of the namespace. It can be any of these values:1 = Created/Active2 = Creating3 = Suspended4 = Deleting

createdAt.description: The time the namespace was created.

updatedAt.description: The time the namespace was updated.

serviceBusEndpoint.description: Endpoint you can use to perform NotificationHub operations.

subscriptionId.description: The Id of the Azure subscription associated with the namespace.

scaleUnit.description: ScaleUnit where the namespace gets created

enabled.description: Whether or not the namespace is currently enabled.

critical.description: Whether or not the namespace is set as Critical.

NamespaceCreateOrUpdateParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate Namespace operation.

sku.description: The sku of the created namespace

NamespacePatchParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Patch Namespace operation.

rights.description: The rights associated with the rule.

primaryKey.description: A base64-encoded 256-bit primary key for signing and validating the SAS token.

secondaryKey.description: A base64-encoded 256-bit primary key for signing and validating the SAS token.

keyName.description: A string that describes the authorization rule.

claimType.description: A string that describes the claim type

claimValue.description: A string that describes the claim value

modifiedTime.description: The last modified time for this rule

createdTime.description: The created time for this rule

revision.description: The revision number for the rule

SharedAccessAuthorizationRuleCreateOrUpd.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate Namespace AuthorizationRules.

value.description: Result of the List Namespace operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of Namespaces

NamespaceListResult.description: The response of the List Namespace operation.

value.description: Result of the List AuthorizationRules operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of AuthorizationRules

SharedAccessAuthorizationRuleListResult.description: The response of the List Namespace operation.

policyKey.description: Name of the key that has to be regenerated for the Namespace/Notification Hub Authorization Rule. The value can be Primary Key/Secondary Key.

apnsCertificate.description: The APNS certificate. Specify if using Certificate Authentication Mode.

certificateKey.description: The APNS certificate password if it exists.

endpoint.description: The APNS endpoint of this credential. If using Certificate Authentication Mode and Sandbox specify 'gateway.sandbox.push.apple.com'. If using Certificate Authentication Mode and Production specify 'gateway.push.apple.com'. If using Token Authentication Mode and Sandbox specify 'https://api.development.push.apple.com:443/3/device'. If using Token Authentication Mode and Production specify 'https://api.push.apple.com:443/3/device'.

thumbprint.description: The APNS certificate thumbprint. Specify if using Certificate Authentication Mode.

keyId.description: A 10-character key identifier (kid) key, obtained from your developer account. Specify if using Token Authentication Mode.

appName.description: The name of the application or BundleId. Specify if using Token Authentication Mode.

appId.description: The issuer (iss) registered claim key. The value is a 10-character TeamId, obtained from your developer account. Specify if using Token Authentication Mode.

token.description: Provider Authentication Token, obtained through your developer account. Specify if using Token Authentication Mode.

ApnsCredentialProperties.description: Description of a NotificationHub ApnsCredential. Note that there is no explicit switch between Certificate and Token Authentication Modes. The mode is determined based on the properties passed in.

packageSid.description: The package ID for this credential.

gcmEndpoint.description: The FCM legacy endpoint. Default value is 'https://fcm.googleapis.com/fcm/send'

certificateKey.description: The certificate key for this credential.

authTokenUrl.description: The URL of the authorization token.

registrationTtl.description: The RegistrationTtl of the created NotificationHub

authorizationRules.description: The AuthorizationRules of the created NotificationHub

apnsCredential.description: The ApnsCredential of the created NotificationHub

wnsCredential.description: The WnsCredential of the created NotificationHub

gcmCredential.description: The GcmCredential of the created NotificationHub

mpnsCredential.description: The MpnsCredential of the created NotificationHub

admCredential.description: The AdmCredential of the created NotificationHub

baiduCredential.description: The BaiduCredential of the created NotificationHub

NotificationHubCreateOrUpdateParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate NotificationHub operation.

NotificationHubPatchParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the patch NotificationHub operation.

PnsCredentialsResource.description: Description of a NotificationHub PNS Credentials.

apnsCredential.description: The ApnsCredential of the created NotificationHub

wnsCredential.description: The WnsCredential of the created NotificationHub

gcmCredential.description: The GcmCredential of the created NotificationHub

mpnsCredential.description: The MpnsCredential of the created NotificationHub

admCredential.description: The AdmCredential of the created NotificationHub

baiduCredential.description: The BaiduCredential of the created NotificationHub

PnsCredentialsProperties.description: Description of a NotificationHub PNS Credentials.

value.description: Result of the List NotificationHub operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of NotificationHub

NotificationHubListResult.description: The response of the List NotificationHub operation.

sku.description: The sku of the created namespace

name.description: Name of the notification hub sku

Sku.description: The Sku description for a namespace

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
